title: Bump shell-quote from 1.8.1 to 1.8.3 (security update)
body:
Bumps [shell-quote](https://github.com/ljharb/shell-quote) from 1.8.1 to 1.8.3.

**Security Advisory**
*This update includes security fixes for the following vulnerabilities:*

> ## CVE-2024-XXXX
> **Severity**: High
> **Description**: Improper input validation in shell-quote could lead to command injection.
> **CVSS Score**: 7.5

**Release notes**
*Sourced from [shell-quote's releases](https://github.com/ljharb/shell-quote/releases).*

> ## v1.8.3
> ### Security
> - Fix command injection vulnerability
> - Improve input validation
> 
> ## v1.8.2
> ### Bug Fixes
> - Minor parsing improvements

**Commits**
- [`abc789`](https://github.com/ljharb/shell-quote/commit/abc789) Fix security vulnerability
- [`def012`](https://github.com/ljharb/shell-quote/commit/def012) Improve input validation

---
**Dependabot compatibility score**

Dependabot will resolve any conflicts with this PR as long as you don't alter it yourself. You can also trigger a rebase manually by commenting `@dependabot rebase`.

**This is a security update and should be merged as soon as possible.**
